column4: 10.10 meerkat on dell netbook every apps gets installed but returns an "-1 exit code " strange huh ??
i have a problem with insatlled any apps or packages on 10.10 meerkat the app gets installed but returns an error code stating that the installation has failed but th app get install sucessfully
when i authorize to install apps teh authorizewith freezes
i have a question can u take a remote of my system
i can trust u guys right
if the pacakges are installing..  is theres some other issue breaking things?
when in doubt fall back to the command line.  it will give more detailed info/errors.
i would start with opening a terminal, and try ing 'sudo apt-get update' and 'sudo apt-get upgrade'  and look for any errors
getting back to the actual problem -->  i would start with opening a terminal, and try ing 'sudo apt-get update' and 'sudo apt-get upgrade'  and look for any errors
the gui package manager tools may have some quirky bugs you are seeing. i rarely use them.
theres no need to flood us with  common 'no problem' type messages..
if the update and upgrade dont give any errors. try installing somthing 'sudo apt-get install cheese' (for example)
if it installed to a directory in your users home.. delete that directory,.
